newsitem.title: CZECH REPUBLIC: CZECH CBANK TO RAISE REPO RATES AS OF MAY 16.
newsitem.headline: CZECH CBANK TO RAISE REPO RATES AS OF MAY 16.

text.p: The Czech central bank (CNB) said in a statement on Thursday that it would raise its repo rates and make their usage flexible as of May 16.

"The bank board decided effective (Friday) to increase the level of repo rates and make their usage more flexible according to the development of the foreign exchange and money markets," the statement said.
The statement did not say what the CNB would raise repo rates to. The current repo rate stands at 12.4 percent, while the reverse repo rate stands at 12.6 percent.
